Posts.Content: kansas wrote: I have stage IV cancer and am taking monthly Zometa infusions, as well as a monthly injection of Faslodex. I am having severe side effects from the Faslodex. Have any of you had Faslodex injections? Love, Kansas Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Faslodex kansas kansas

Posts.Content: kansas wrote: I've had bone mets extensively throughout my body for about 5-years.  My PET scan showed two lesions on my liver.  The latest PET scan showed that they had grown.  Had not had chemo due to having radiation twice since October (broke my neck and then had leg pain).  I'm now on Doxil.  I'm scared.  Love to you all, Kansas Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Dx'd with Liver Mets 11/09 kansas konakat
